## SavedObjectTypeRegistry.getIndex() method

Returns the `indexPattern` property for given type, or `undefined` if the type is not registered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getIndex(type: string): string | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
